name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 9, a blogger posted a video saying that a couple had closed all their businesses due to the three-year epidemic, and they were in debt and insolvent. They were constantly called by various collection calls from banks and online loans every day. Their credit was black and their reputation was gone. They could not see any hope and could not bear it. In the end, they had no way out and decided to commit suicide to escape their current life. In the end, they hoped that their parents would sell the house and take their children back to the countryside to live. In the comment section of this video, many netizens were telling about their debt experiences and encouraging them to do their best. Some people also said not to buy a house, not to gamble, not to overspend, and to work hard. According to data, there will be 800 million people in debt in 2022, including 400 million house slaves, with an average debt of 142,850 yuan per person and a total debt of more than 200 trillion yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As the incident of "female executives illegally dismissing employees" fermented, a layoff communication training material compiled by a domestic company's HR was exposed. In the material, we can see that the language is very rigorous. For example, in order to allow employees to sign contracts and leave as soon as possible, words such as "layoffs" and "reductions" must not be used, and only department adjustments can be said; once employees are found recording, they must be reminded that the communication content involves company confidential information and ask employees not to record; "company" must be used instead of the specific company name to prevent employees from secretly recording, etc.

Follow-up of Glodon cancelling year-end bonus for all employees: The union chairman received 100% of votes.
On January 9, Glodon held a communication meeting with employees.
The union chairman Yuan said: We can represent employees, and all employee representative conferences are legal and compliant and represent everyone's opinions. There is no need for everyone to send the company to the hot search for a little year-end bonus.
In response, Glodon employees launched a "vote on the union chairman's statement" on the company's intranet. More than 100 employees participated, and 100% of employees believed that the union chairman was completely on the opposite side of the employees and could not represent themselves.
